Method Detail

hitTest

public boolean hitTest(int x,
                       int y,
                       int width,
                       int height)
Returns true if this AnimatedLabel contains the Rectangle(x, y, width, height)

requires: Is only intended for use with the flyswatter and may not work with other Rectangles

Parameters:
x - Top-left corner of Rectangle
y - Top-left corner of Rectangle
width - Width of Rectangle
height - Height of Rectangle
Returns:
true if flyswatter is over the AnimatedLabel, false if not

public void step()
Handles a single step of animation

sendCursorLocation

public void sendCursorLocation(int x,
                               int y)
Sends location of cursor to AnimatedThing for the purpose of causing damage

Parameters:
x - Top left corner of cursor image
y - Top left corner of cursor image
